name: Deft Dream
description:
People who said never bring a sword to a gunfight don't know what they're talking about, but in a dream, you control the outcome. Battle the Dream Drones with your retro sword and defeat the Nightmare Golem beyond the walls. 

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

Controls:

Right click - deflect bullets

Instructions:

Survive the Dream Drones and pass the rooms until defeat the Nightmare Golem awaiting your arrival in the final room. 

Note: This game is hard. Good luck. Also, we are aware of the bugs in this game. There's a lot but we hope you still enjoy the experience. Feel free to leave some feedback in the comments down below.

Credits:

Game was made by Split15, GArtem, Connor WC and Terdix. Special thanks to them as none of this would be possible without them.
